messages.title: Let’s get Britain on the road to recovery
messages.content: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession. Now more than ever our country needs the right policies to get the economy moving again. At the election, it’s up to you to decide who will offer the best deal for you and your family. In many areas that choice is between the Liberal Democrats and the Conservatives. Labour are out of the running and can’t win in many parts of Britain. After thirteen years of disappointment and failure, you’ve seen what Labour can do.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vince Cable emphasizes the need for the right policies to avoid recession and get the economy moving. He criticizes Labour's history of disappointment and failure. The Liberal Democrats offer a different approach to managing the economy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour are out of the running and can’t win in many parts of Britain.

issues.economy: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - Labour can’t win in many areas of Britain. For real change, fairer taxes and a strong economy, make sure you back the Liberal Democrats on election day.
